resources.string: Welcome to Race Yourself\nAre you ready to run?

This is your home screen where most of the action happens

RY is all about planning 'races' to make sure you get off the couch and to make it more fun to push yourself

It's the ultimate way to stay motivated + have fun running
This is your chosen opponent\n\nWhether it\'s a friend, someone from the community or a zombie or your own personal best - you have to race VERSUS something!
When you\'re ready, hit run to start your race. You never need to wait, you\'re racing against other people\'s pre-recorded tracks.
The store. After your first run you will earn some coins. At the store you can spend your hard-earn bounty on features and upgrades.
As it\'s your first race, you may want to try Automatch. It will find someone from the community of similar skill to run with.
